Medicine
JM
Chapter



–

Per NICE Guideline ‘Intravenous fluid therapy in adults in hospital’ (CG 174, 2017), routine fluid maintenance over a 24 hour period amounts to on average: * 25-30 ml/kg/day of water * Approximately 1 mmol/kg/day each of sodium, chloride and potassium * 50 - 100 g/day of glucose to limit starvation ketosis
